about_the_game:
◆Story

With the coming of the once-in-a-decade period for demons to come into oestrus and breed, demons are beginning to swarm out of the dungeons in search of a female to meet their needs.

To save an abandoned village in the borderlands
The elf knight Cyril boldly goes into a dungeon full of crazy demons...

◆Game Features

●Elf knight will be done by the demons a lot of indescribable things~

It is a classic tower defense action game!



●The operation is very easy to learn, and it is an action game that very easy to play by using the mouse.
Just long press the left mouse button and move the mouse towards the enemy, then you can make a direct sword attack!
Just put the left mouse button away to approach the enemy, and you can enjoy the animation of being H anytime and anywhere!



●There are 10 kinds of dot matrix HCG animation!
Elf knight forced to sex by a group of demons humiliation story, the whole story are full voice!
・Back on bestiality by wolf
・Orc seeding press
・Cannibalistic plant's swallow play
・Tentacle rape by Roper
Of course, there are also goblins, which are absolutely indispensable in the sex demon ...everything is available!

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work .
 The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, Frequent Violence, sexual assault, non-consensual sex , General Mature Content, Bestiality. 
All characters are over the age of 20.

name: Night of the Sex Beast and the Elf Knight

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: With the coming of the once-in-a-decade period for demons to come into oestrus and breed, demons are beginning to swarm out of the dungeons in search of a female to meet their needs, to save an abandoned village in the borderlands The elf knight Cyril boldly goes into a dungeon full of crazy demons
supported_languages:
Japanese*, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
